title: Add AI Logic branding images inspired by Grok AI and ChatGPT style

requirements.text: Generate original branding images for AI Logic with a modern minimal AI-assistant aesthetic similar in vibe to Grok AI and ChatGPT (clean, high-contrast, subtle gradients), without copying or tracing any protected logos or exact assets.

quotes: the image must be like grok ai and chat gpt

acceptanceCriteria: New images are generated as specified in imageRequirements.required
The visuals feel consistent with a modern AI-chat brand (minimal, premium, subtle gradients) while remaining clearly original (not a copy of Grok/ChatGPT marks)

requirements.text: Add the generated branding images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI: replace the current header bot icon with the generated AI Logic logo mark, and use the favicon image in the HTML head.

quotes: the image must be like grok ai and chat gpt

acceptanceCriteria: Generated files exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames from imageRequirements.required
The header in frontend/src/App.tsx displays the new logo image instead of the lucide Bot icon (layout remains aligned and sized appropriately)
frontend/index.html includes a favicon <link> referencing the generated favicon file
No backend changes are required for image rendering

requirements.text: Ensure the updated branding visuals remain consistent with the existing Tailwind theme tokens and do not introduce a new blue/purple-dominant palette.

quotes: the image must be like grok ai and chat gpt

acceptanceCriteria: UI continues using existing CSS variables / Tailwind tokens for colors
No new global theme changes that shift the app into a blue/purple-dominant look

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Do not add any backend endpoints or route image delivery through the backend; images must be served as static frontend assets
Do not copy, trace, or recreate Grok AI or ChatGPT logos/wordmarks; only create original visuals with a similar general aesthetic
nonGoals: Implementing new chat features (memory, streaming, multi-chat, real-time)
Changing backend answer logic or adding new backend storage
Adding third-party authentication beyond existing Internet Identity setup

required: Minimal abstract AI logo mark with subtle gradient on dark background (ai-logic-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Simplified monochrome/duotone favicon version of the logo mark (ai-logic-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
Wide minimal header/hero background with soft gradient and light noise texture, no text (ai-logic-hero.dim_1600x400.png)

preferencesToAdd: Branding images should have a visual vibe similar to Grok AI and ChatGPT (modern, minimal, premium), while remaining original.
